name: Vegan Pumpkin Breakfast Cookies GF
description: For a fall-tastic breakfast treat that is easy to make, look no further than my pumpkin breakfast cookies! Gluten-free, refined sugar-free, oil-free and packed with nutritious add-ins like pumpkin puree, chia seeds, chopped nuts, and rolled oats.Â
recipeIngredient: 1/3 cup pumpkin puree (not pumpkin pie mix)
1/2 cup chopped dates (Or use raisins or dried cranberries )
1/3 cup chopped nuts and seeds such as  (pecans, walnuts, sunflower seeds, pumpkin seeds)

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix the pumpkin puree and the maple syrup until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, mix the pumpkin puree and the maple syrup until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl, mix the almond flour, baking powder, salt, oats, coconut, pumpkin pie spice, cinnamon, nuts, dates and seeds.
recipeInstructions.name: In another bowl, mix the almond flour, baking powder, salt, oats, coconut, pumpkin pie spice, cinnamon, nuts, dates and seeds.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine both of the bowls into one bowl and mix really well. You'll have to press and mix so that the pumpkin mixture mixes with the dry.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine both of the bowls into one bowl and mix really well. You'll have to press and mix so that the pumpkin mixture mixes with the dry.

recipeInstructions.text: Let the mixture chill for 15 minutes then use a cookie cutter to press it into 1/4 inch thick cookies. Place a 2 to 2.5 inch cookie cutter on parchment-lined baking sheet and then press mixture into the cookie cutter. Tap to release.
recipeInstructions.name: Let the mixture chill for 15 minutes then use a cookie cutter to press it into 1/4 inch thick cookies. Place a 2 to 2.5 inch cookie cutter on parchment-lined baking sheet and then press mixture into the cookie cutter. Tap to release.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 330 degrees Fahrenheit (165 c ) for 18-20 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 330 degrees Fahrenheit (165 c ) for 18-20 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: These cookies can be stored on the counter for the day and refrigerator for up to a week.
recipeInstructions.name: These cookies can be stored on the counter for the day and refrigerator for up to a week.

keywords: gluten free pumpkin cookies, pumpkin cookies
